snippet: David Ortiz, the World Series most valuable player, won his sixth Silver Slugger award as the top designated hitter in voting by major league managers and coaches.
abstract: Boston Red Sox star David Ortiz, the World Series most valuable player, wins his sixth Silver Slugger award as the top designated hitter in voting by major league managers and coaches.
lead_paragraph: David Ortiz, the World Series most valuable player, won his sixth Silver Slugger award as the top designated hitter in voting by major league managers and coaches.
